body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. wait for opponent to cast an arfact creature
2. cast Domineer, enchanting target artifact creature
3. don't gain control of previously enchanted target What is the expected output? What do you see instead? enchanted artifact creature should switch sides What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.
author: [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/)
title: Domineer: enchanted artifact creature stays on opponent's side

comments.body:
Domineer was missing its ability

**Status:** Fixed  
  **Owner:** ShawnieBoyUK
comments.author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)

content:
_From [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/) on March 13, 2014 23:23:32_

What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. wait for opponent to cast an arfact creature
2. cast Domineer, enchanting target artifact creature
3. don't gain control of previously enchanted target What is the expected output? What do you see instead? enchanted artifact creature should switch sides What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.
